## Block.allInputsFilled() method

Recursively checks whether all statement and value inputs are filled with blocks. Also checks all following statement blocks in this stack.

**Signature:**

```typescript
allInputsFilled(opt_shadowBlocksAreFilled?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

opt\_shadowBlocksAreFilled


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional argument controlling whether shadow blocks are counted as filled. Defaults to true.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

True if all inputs are filled, false otherwise.
